articles.description: Chinese government-backed hackers have breached "major telecommunications companies," among a range of targets worldwide, by exploiting known software flaws in routers and other popular network networking gear, US security agencies warned Tuesday.
articles.content: Washington (CNN)Chinese government-backed hackers have breached "major telecommunications companies," among a range of targets worldwide, by exploiting known software flaws in routers and other popul… [+2068 chars]

articles.author: Carly Page
articles.title: FBI seizes notorious marketplace for selling millions of stolen SSNs - TechCrunch
articles.description: SSNDOB listed the personal information for 24 million individuals in the United States.
articles.content:
U.S. law enforcement have announced the takedown of SSNDOB, a notorious marketplace used for trading the personal information including Social Security numbers, or SSNs of millions of Americans.
